item.title: Interview Guide
item.description: Preface I curated these notes over the course of my preparation for tech interviews during the fall of 2021. Majority of the preparation was targeted at getting Sr. Engineering positions, but the overall prep strategy would be similar across engineering levels from Junior to Senior. Entry level engineers can skip the System Design sections. During the preparation I was employed at Amazon as a SDE 2, with total 8 years of experience.
